abstract: Children of Nazish Noorani, who was killed in August in shooting that New Jersey police say was set up by her husband Kashif Parvaiz, have become focus of custody battle between the two Pakistani families; Nooranis and some community leaders in Boonton, NJ, are shocked to learn that the husband's family can even have a claim for custody.
snippet: Since the husband of Nazish Noorani was accused of killing her in August, their children have become the focus of a custody battle between two Pakistani families.
lead_paragraph: Since the husband of Nazish Noorani was accused of killing her in August, their children have become the focus of a custody battle between two Pakistani families.

headline.main: After Arrest of Man in Wife’s Death, a Custody Fight
headline.print_headline: After Arrest of Man in Wife’s Death, a Custody Fight
headline.seo: After Woman’s Killing in Boonton, N.J., a Custody Fight
